title: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart in Peril

sources.title: A Woman In Jeopardy (Peril) | Full Thriller Drama Movie | Morgan Fairchild
sources.description:
A Woman In Jeopardy (Peril) - With police on his trail, escaped psychotic mental patient Vincent takes Terry, a woman in need of help, hostage.
2000. Stars: Michael Paré, Morgan Fairchild, John James

metadata.Plot: Fourth film in the Lone Wolf and Cub series. Ogami is hired to kill a tattooed female assassin. Gunbei Yagyu, an enemy samurai, happens upon Ogami's son, and sees his chance for revenge.
metadata.Actors: Tomisaburô Wakayama, Yoichi Hayashi, Michi Azuma
